original_content:
Job Description-

This role will blend business acumen with technical proficiency, requiring the ability to understand complex business processes and translate them into effective system configurations. You will be a key player in ensuring our systems accurately reflect business needs and operate efficiently. This position will focus heavily on the developing new processes with technical solutions with the vehicle configuration space. The position will utilize ML and AI to quickly develop solutions.

 • Collaborate with stakeholders across various departments to understand business needs, gather detailed requirements, and document them clearly and concisely using various techniques (e.g., user stories, use cases, process flows). 

• Translate business requirements into technical configurations within our [mention specific system] backend. This includes, but is not limited to:

 • Developing and maintaining configuration specifications.

 • Creating and modifying data mappings and integrations.

 • Implementing and testing new configurations.

 • Troubleshooting and resolving configuration-related issues. 

• Analyze existing data to identify trends, inefficiencies, and areas for improvement. This may involve querying databases, generating reports, and visualizing data using appropriate tools. 

• Identify opportunities to streamline business processes and improve system efficiency through configuration changes and best practices. 

• Thoroughly test configurations to ensure they meet requirements and function as expected. Participate in user acceptance testing (UAT). 

• Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps. 

• Work closely with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure smooth implementation and ongoing support of system configurations.

Skills Required:

-Strong analytical and problem-solving skills. -Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration skills. -Ability to translate complex technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences.

Skills Preferred:

-Java experience -SQL experience

Experience Required:

-ML experience and implementation experience

Experience Preferred:

-Experience with Agile methodologies is a plus. -Experience with vehicle configuration is a plus.
enhanced_versions:
**Company & Role Description:**
This role will blend business acumen with technical proficiency, requiring the ability to understand complex business processes and translate them into effective system configurations. You will be a key player in ensuring our systems accurately reflect business needs and operate efficiently. This position will focus heavily on developing new processes with technical solutions within the vehicle configuration space, leveraging machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI) to drive innovation.

**Foundation Requirements:**
- Implementing and testing new configurations
- Troubleshooting and resolving configuration-related issues
- Analyzing existing data to identify trends, inefficiencies, and areas for improvement, which may involve querying databases, generating reports, and visualizing data using appropriate tools

**Specific Role Requirements:**
- Collaborate with stakeholders across various departments to understand business needs, gather detailed requirements, and document them clearly and concisely using techniques such as user stories, use cases, and process flows
- Translate business requirements into technical configurations within our [mention specific system] backend, including but not limited to:
  - Developing and maintaining configuration specifications
  - Creating and modifying data mappings and integrations
- Identify opportunities to streamline business processes and improve system efficiency through configuration changes and best practices
- Thoroughly test configurations to ensure they meet requirements and function as expected, and participate in user acceptance testing (UAT)
- Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps
- Work closely with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure smooth implementation and ongoing support of system configurations

**Preferred Qualifications:**
- Experience with Agile methodologies is a plus
- Experience with vehicle configuration is a plus

**Company & Role Description:**
This role is a unique blend of business acumen and technical expertise, where you will be responsible for translating complex business processes into effective system configurations. As a key member of our team, you will ensure our systems accurately reflect business needs and operate at peak efficiency. Your focus will be on developing innovative technical solutions within the vehicle configuration space, leveraging the power of machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI).

**Foundation Requirements:**
- Implementing and testing new configurations with a keen eye for detail
- Proactively troubleshooting and resolving configuration-related issues
- Conducting in-depth data analysis to identify trends, inefficiencies, and opportunities for improvement, utilizing database querying, reporting, and data visualization tools

**Specific Role Requirements:**
- Collaborate closely with stakeholders across various departments to deeply understand their business needs, gather comprehensive requirements, and document them using industry-standard techniques such as user stories, use cases, and process flows
- Translate those business requirements into cutting-edge technical configurations within our [mention specific system] backend, including:
  - Developing and maintaining robust configuration specifications
  - Designing and implementing seamless data mappings and integrations
- Continuously seek out opportunities to streamline business processes and enhance system efficiency through innovative configuration changes and the adoption of best practices
- Rigorously test configurations to ensure they not only meet requirements but also function flawlessly, actively participating in user acceptance testing (UAT)
- Meticulously document system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps to maintain a comprehensive knowledge base
- Collaborate closely with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure smooth implementation and ongoing support of the configured systems

**Preferred Qualifications:**
- Proven experience with Agile methodologies is highly desirable
- Familiarity with vehicle configuration systems is a distinct advantage

**Company & Role Description:**
This is a dynamic role that blends your deep business acumen with exceptional technical proficiency. You will be a key player in ensuring our systems accurately reflect the evolving needs of our business and operate at peak efficiency. Your primary focus will be on developing innovative technical solutions within the vehicle configuration space, leveraging the transformative power of machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI) to drive continuous improvement.

**Foundation Requirements:**
- Expertly implementing and rigorously testing new configurations to ensure they meet the highest standards
- Proactively identifying and resolving complex configuration-related issues with a keen eye for detail
- Conducting comprehensive data analyses to uncover insightful trends, identify inefficiencies, and pinpoint areas for improvement, leveraging advanced database querying, reporting, and data visualization techniques

**Specific Role Requirements:**
- Collaborate closely and build strong partnerships with stakeholders across various departments to deeply understand their evolving business needs, gather comprehensive and forward-looking requirements, and document them using industry-leading techniques such as user stories, use cases, and process flows
- Seamlessly translate those business requirements into cutting-edge technical configurations within our [mention specific system] backend, including:
  - Developing and maintaining configuration specifications that are both robust and adaptable
  - Designing and implementing sophisticated data mappings and integrations that drive operational efficiency
- Continuously seek out and implement opportunities to streamline business processes and enhance system efficiency through innovative configuration changes and the adoption of industry-leading best practices
- Rigorously test configurations to ensure they not only meet requirements but also function flawlessly under the most demanding conditions, actively leading user acceptance testing (UAT) efforts
- Meticulously document system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps to maintain a comprehensive and easily accessible knowledge base
- Collaborate closely with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure smooth implementation and ongoing support of the configured systems, serving as a trusted technical advisor

**Preferred Qualifications:**
- Proven experience with Agile methodologies and a track record of driving successful Agile transformations is highly desirable
- Extensive familiarity with vehicle configuration systems and a deep understanding of the associated industry trends and best practices is a distinct advantage
